value: Somebody has broken the connection for security buzzers. Go and fix it
Captain TJ is a hardworking pupper. Your job is to pamper him. Brush him for 10 seconds
Can you use the tablet and welcome the aliens ?. Mind that they come with their own drones. Use the AR app Visiting Friends menu
Make sure all the doors in the house are closed
White contains all colors. More colors means more information. Please make sure our white light circuit is working
We need ventilation, Open all the doors lieutenant
Find the treasure cups and make a tower. We need to impress the aliens
Make sure aliens don't access our security systems. Find the key card (it's green) and swipe it on the security phone
There seems a shortage in O2 supplies. Check the oxygen level. Use the AR app Admin:Check Status menu
Make sure our friends on Mars are safe and working. Use the AR app Make them work menu
We are under attack. Pot one ball on the snooker table
We need to prepare and send a signal, set the pool table
Our star has 25 neighbours, take a selfie with the stars. Make sure you also include our space ship
